author: Paul
content:
Although I find some of Apple's policies 'constraining', I do really like the iPhone 4 a lot! As you know, I take many pictures with that phone, using various applications. Also, I've not seen any other smartphone that I think that comes close in design, especially in ease of use. There is something to be said, in my book, about design.
